document.full_text: "pirates of the caribbean: on stranger tides" weighed anchor with $346.4 million in ticket sales from its first week in worldwide release and set a record as the biggest film debut ever outside north america, according to studio estimates on sunday.
document.title: "pirates" sails with overseas box office record
lines_and_colors: "pirates of the caribbean: on stranger tides" weighed anchor with $346.4 million in ticket sales from its first week in worldwide release and set a record as the biggest film debut ever outside north america, according to studio estimates on sunday.
